comments:
build I20040106

- selected several binary projects for deletion
- deleted them
- all were successfully deleted, except one (org.eclipse.ui.tests) for which 
it complained that it could not delete the CVS dir.
- tried again just on that project, and was able to delete it OK.
- the log shows that the CVS decorator was trying to access the CVS/Entries 
file

Log has:

!MESSAGE Could not delete: c:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.ui.tests\CVS.
!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 Jan 09, 2004 13:16:03.384
!MESSAGE Could not delete: c:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.ui.tests\CVS.

The log indicates that the Entries file was deleted while the decorator was 
still running (or just before it ran).  But then subsequently the UI was not 
able to delete the project.

Fix released to HEAD. We now catch the exception and, if the code is 
FAILED_READ_LOCAL or RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND we continue as if there is no synn 
info. I suspect that the deletion will still fail but there is little we can 
do about that.
